review.title: “Worked as a Public Relations Officer.”
review.pros: Pros – H.Stern has store around the world, it's alrage company and a great place to work at.
review.cons: Cons – If I had to mention one thing, it would be trying to be perfectionist.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Set goals for every single employee.

review.title: “An ok experience in sales for English speakers”
review.pros: Pros – You set the pace when learning their sales technique, co-worker tend to be warm, inviting, and friendly--a family-like community. Enjoyable social interactions. Meet interesting people (customers and colleagues, alike). High end luxury, very affluent and international clientele. Professional "Americanized" standards of operation.
review.cons: Cons – Terrible base salary (consistent and superior sales skills can allow you to receive a reasonable paycheck, though). Petty fights with colleagues and clientele are sure to happen on occasion. Can be very boring when there's no foot traffic.not allowed to sell on the selling floor for the first month.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Provide better training resources. Allow sales associates to receive ample one-on-one practice with the customer, instead of allowing for recent hires to rely and come to depend upon colleagues with seniority for help.
